Service Details: - Supports the health and wellness of students and campus community by providing information on accessible, client-centered state-of-the-art medical facilities and a range of community services available in the Okanagan- Provides professionally-trained counsellors and other resources to assist students in coping with problem areas that may interfere with academic and social potential
